column4: anybody knows of a website where I can learn more about ubuntu???
get the linux from scratch book
linux from scratch?  i want to be a little more specific, im using ubuntu
what more about ubuntu do you want to learn?
i want to learn the config directories, how modules get loaded, and how to change look and feel, etc.
i don't think you can learn these technical details with ubuntu documentation
the pages that you just sent me can be a start, though, thanks!!!!!!!!!!!!
most books and documents on ubuntu tell you the obvious stuff
true, that is why i am opting for a website instead
i don't think i want to get geekier than i already am but thanks for the advice
here is my first project, how can i get create a restore point on ubuntu?
i think you would need a sophisticated backup program for that.. i'm not a pro user myself
thanks for the 411, I am off to read the websites you pointed me to
